scripts.bundle: npm run compile && "node_modules/.bin/shx" mkdir -p dist && "node_modules/.bin/browserify" build/main/js-message.js -s js-message -o dist/js-message.js
scripts.docs: node_modules/.bin/shx rm -rf ./dist/docs && "node_modules/.bin/cross-conf-env" typedoc --options typedoc.json src/main/api/ -name "js-message vnpm_package_version"
scripts.all: npm run compress && npm run test && npm run docs && "node_modules/.bin/shx" echo Finished successfully.
